description: This file defines a React functional component named Modal that renders a modal dialog with overlay, title, close button, optional footer, and handles keyboard accessibility. It also imports associated CSS styles.

methods.name: Modal({ open, onClose, title, children, footer })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a modal dialog with accessibility features, overlay, header, body, and optional footer.
